name: Sycle
description:
Sycle is a turn-based roguelite with Mesoamerican-inspired aesthetics.

Our goal as Goddess of Change is to re-create the world.

DEVELOPED BY:

DEMIGAMES

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL PADUA, YEAR 3, 2021/2022)
